title: Stacked Crop Beginning Stocks Over Time
description: This interactive stacked area chart displays the cumulative beginning stocks for various crops in million bushels across different marketing years. It allows for easy comparison of trends between commodities and shows the total stocks for all commodities combined. Hover over areas to see detailed information for each year and commodity, though note that the tooltip y-position currently doesn't follow the curve accurately. The x-axis labels are rotated and spaced for improved readability.
